verses.verse: And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>spoke<s%> to them <S%G3825>again<s%> by <S%G3850>parables,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%>
The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3666>like<s%> to a <S%G444>certain<s%> <S%G935>king,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G1062>marriage<s%> for his son, <S%G5207><s%>

And <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G649>forth<s%> his <S%G1401>servants<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> them that were <S%G2564>bidden<s%> to the <S%G1062>wedding:<s%> and they <S%G2309>would<s%> not come. <S%G2064><s%>

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G649>forth<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1401>servants,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2036>Tell<s%> them which are <S%G2564>bidden,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I have <S%G2090>prepared<s%> my <S%G712>dinner:<s%> my <S%G5022>oxen<s%> and my fatted calves <S%G4619><s%> are <S%G2380>killed,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> things are <S%G2092>ready:<s%> <S%G1205>come<s%> to the marriage. <S%G1062><s%>
But they <S%G272>made<s%> <S%G272>light<s%> of it, and <S%G565>went<s%> their ways, one <S%G3538><s%> <S%G3303><s%> to his <S%G68>farm,<s%> another to his merchandise: <S%G1711><s%>
And the <S%G3062>remnant<s%> <S%G2902>took<s%> his <S%G1401>servants,<s%> and entreated <S%G5195><s%> them <S%G5195>spitefully,<s%> and slew <S%G615><s%> them.

But when the <S%G935>king<s%> heard <S%G191><s%> thereof, he was <S%G3710>wroth:<s%> and he <S%G3992>sent<s%> forth his <S%G4753>armies,<s%> and <S%G622>destroyed<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G5406>murderers,<s%> and <S%G1714>burned<s%> up their city. <S%G4172><s%>
<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he to his <S%G1401>servants,<s%> The <S%G1062>wedding<s%> is <S%G2092>ready,<s%> but they which were <S%G2564>bidden<s%> were not worthy. <S%G514><s%>

<S%G4198>Go<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> the highways, <S%G1327><s%> <S%G3598><s%> and as <S%G3745>many<s%> as you shall <S%G2147>find,<s%> <S%G2564>bid<s%> to the marriage. <S%G1062><s%>

<S%G2532>So<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> the highways, <S%G1327><s%> <S%G3598><s%> and <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> as <S%G3745>many<s%> as they <S%G2147>found,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G4190>bad<s%> and <S%G18>good:<s%> and the <S%G1062>wedding<s%> was <S%G4130>furnished<s%> with guests. <S%G345><s%>

And when the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G1525>came<s%> in to <S%G2300>see<s%> the <S%G345>guests,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G1746>had<s%> not <S%G1746>on<s%> a <S%G1062>wedding<s%> garment: <S%G1742><s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2083>Friend,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G1525>came<s%> you in <S%G5602>here<s%> not <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G1062>wedding<s%> <S%G1742>garment?<s%> And he was speechless. <S%G5392><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> to the <S%G1249>servants,<s%> <S%G1210>Bind<s%> him <S%G5495>hand<s%> and <S%G4228>foot,<s%> and <S%G142>take<s%> him <S%G142>away,<s%> and cast <S%G1544><s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1857>outer<s%> <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall be <S%G2805>weeping<s%> and <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>
For <S%G4183>many<s%> are <S%G2822>called,<s%> but few <S%G3641><s%> are chosen. <S%G1588><s%>
<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> and <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G4824>counsel<s%> <S%G3704>how<s%> they might <S%G3802>entangle<s%> him in his <S%G3056>talk.<s%>

And they <S%G649>sent<s%> out to him their <S%G3101>disciples<s%> with the <S%G2265>Herodians,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> that you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G227>true,<s%> and <S%G1321>teach<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3199>care<s%> you for <S%G3762>any<s%> <S%G3762>man:<s%> for you <S%G991>regard<s%> not the <S%G4383>person<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>
<S%G2036>Tell<s%> us <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> you? Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G2778>tribute<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> not?
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1097>perceived<s%> their <S%G4189>wickedness,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G3985>tempt<s%> you me, you hypocrites? <S%G5273><s%>
<S%G1925>Show<s%> me the <S%G2778>tribute<s%> money. <S%G3546><s%> And they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to him a <S%G1220>penny.<s%>
And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Whose <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%> and superscription? <S%G1923><s%>

They <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, <S%G2541>Caesar's.<s%> <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he to them, <S%G591>Render<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar<s%> the things which are <S%G2541>Caesar's;<s%> and to <S%G2316>God<s%> the things that are God's. <S%G2316><s%>
When they had <S%G191>heard<s%> these words, they <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> and <S%G863>left<s%> him, and <S%G565>went<s%> their way.

The <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him the <S%G4523>Sadducees,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that there is <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G386>resurrection,<s%> and <S%G1905>asked<s%> him,

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G599>die,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> shall <S%G1918>marry<s%> his <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and <S%G450>raise<s%> up <S%G4690>seed<s%> to his <S%G80>brother.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> there were with us <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G80>brothers:<s%> and the <S%G4413>first,<s%> when he had <S%G1060>married<s%> a wife, <S%G5053>deceased,<s%> and, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4690>issue,<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%> to his <S%G80>brother:<s%>
<S%G3668>Likewise<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> and the <S%G5154>third,<s%> to the <S%G2035>seventh.<s%>
And <S%G5305>last<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> in the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G5101>whose<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> shall she be of the <S%G2033>seven?<s%> for they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> her.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, You do <S%G4105>err,<s%> not <S%G1492>knowing<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For in the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> they <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G1060>marry,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> are <S%G1547>given<s%> in <S%G1548>marriage,<s%> but are as the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

But as <S%G4012>touching<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> have you not <S%G314>read<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> to you by <S%G2316>God,<s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2384>Jacob?<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is not the <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> but of the living. <S%G2198><s%>
And when the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> this, they were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> his <S%G1322>doctrine.<s%>
But when the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> had <S%G191>heard<s%> that he had put the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> to <S%G5392>silence,<s%> they were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G1909>together.<s%>
<S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them, which was a <S%G3544>lawyer,<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> him a question, <S%G3985>tempting<s%> him, and <S%G3004>saying,<s%>
<S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G4169>which<s%> is the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> in the <S%G3551>law?<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, You shall <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G5590>soul,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your mind. <S%G1271><s%>
<S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G4413>first<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> commandment. <S%G1785><s%>
And the second <S%G1208><s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> to it, You shall <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as yourself. <S%G4572><s%>
<S%G1722>On<s%> <S%G5025>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%> <S%G2910>hang<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> and the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
While the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> them,
<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> you of <S%G5547>Christ?<s%> <S%G5101>whose<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> is he? They <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, The son of <S%G1138>David.<s%>
He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> does <S%G1138>David<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2564>call<s%> him <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

The <S%G2962>LORD<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to my <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2521>Sit<s%> you <S%G1537>on<s%> my <S%G1188>right<s%> hand, <S%G2193>till<s%> I <S%G5087>make<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> your footstool? <S%G5286><s%> <S%G4228><s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2564>call<s%> him <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> is he his son? <S%G5207><s%>

And <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G611>answer<s%> him a <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G5111>dared<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man from that <S%G2250>day<s%> forth <S%G1905>ask<s%> him <S%G3765>any<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> questions.
